name: Werewolves Revenge
summary:
Werewolves Revenge is a first person social deduction game where your voice is your greatest weapon.

The Town must work together to identify and eliminate the Werewolves before it's too late..

The Werewolves secretly meet at night, allowing them to scheme and attack a player.

Neutrals, loyal only to themselves, find their place in the chaos.

Played by up to 16 Players, games are filled with deceit, murder and plot twists.
